title: Saw a Shyvana solo drag at level 3 yesterday
body: Shyvana is completely busted. I don't care who you are. No one should have that much objective control so early in the game.

replies.body: Last we checked, every champion can solo the dragon at level 3.  Literally every single one could solo it.  So it makes sense that a champion strong at jungling can do that when everyone can.

> [{quoted}](name=Sona Ping,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0r8ej3ZL,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-03T21:16:04.548+0000)
>
> Last we checked, every champion can solo the dragon at level 3.  Literally every single one could solo it.  So it makes sense that a champion strong at jungling can do that when everyone can.

Not every single champion can do it. And that type of objective control is absolutely insane. You shouldn't be able to do that as anyone.

No.
LITERALLY every single champion has been shown to do that.  Google it.

If champions who aren't even supposed to be jungling can feasibly do it, it should be no surprise when a champion who is actually supposed to do that does it as well.
i miss when malz could take it at lvl 2 (unless it was fire drake, then he had to wait til lvl3 like everyone else)
{{champion:77}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:2}} ?
lol?
This is new? lol.  I've seen many champs solo it at level 3 and it's never been a problem.
Exactly. ANYONE can solo dragon at level 3 with proper masteries and runes.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LSw9xrwwyZ0
It's basically Shyvanna's new passive. She's supposed to have the early dragon control and her opponents are supposed to play around that.

I saw a master yi do absolutely nothing 

since patch 6.6

> [{quoted}](name=grug,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0r8ej3ZL,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-12-03T21:35:57.000+0000)
>
> I saw a master yi do absolutely nothing 
> 
> since patch 6.6


Is that suppose to be a bad thing?
{{champion:19}} can't he do it at like 2?

Wasn't {{champion:80}} able to do it way sooner than Level 3 back before they removed it? Not sure if it was at level 1 or 2, but back before Pantheon's passive worked on Dragon, he was able to do it much quicker. Honestly, considering it's in {{champion:102}} lore, she should be the easiest and fastest person to take dragon...and now she has a passive that helps her with it and is extremely reliant on it.
It was at level one with Pantheon.

I saw a Warwick solo Dragon at level 4 yesterday. I've done it with Aatrox at level 4. This is nothing special. The reason it doesn't happen as often is because it takes a decade to kill it at such early levels by yourself. The enemy jungler could do a lot of damage to your team while you're making love to the Dragon in all that time.
lul
She has always done this.
but otherwise she has no passive
{{champion:9}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:20}}
